nodes.text: Mennac Vanderijar, commonly referred to as Mennac the Hutt, was a Hutt (with a female personality) and a middle-level gangster in the criminal organization of the Vanderijar clan. Her palace/fortress was located on Nal Hutta. Mennac's consort was Jobwah the Hutt, and she owned a kentril, which was a vicious carnivorous rodent.
